code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{roomsPerPage,totalRooms,currentPage,paginate}=_ref;const pageNumbers=[];for(let i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalRooms/roomsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagination-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"pagination-ul",children:pageNumbers.map(number=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"pagination-li",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>paginate(number),className:"pagination-button ".concat(currentPage===number?'current-page':''),children:number})},number))})});};export default Pagination;
